posts.post_title: T222 Fatima Grover Alexander SGC Auth - Sold
posts.post_content:
T222 Fatima Grover Alexander SGC Auth

Decent front. Not the greatest back. Tough card rookie card of a great HOFer. Where are you going to find another example for under $400?

$sold delivered. Paypal f/f. Firm.
